channel.title: Warning on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Warning on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-70 West - White Sands Missile Range Warning
item.description: Warning on US-70 west leaving Alamogordo: When flashing US-70 closed ahead. Expect one hour delay.

item.title: US-93 North - Next Gas 78 Miles
item.description: Next Gas 78 Miles on US-93 north. Taken just north of the Alt. US-93/US-93 intersection. Wells is the next city with gas.

item.title: AZ-180A West - Winter Driving Warning
item.description: Warning on AZ-180A that the highway is not plowed nights or on weekends during storms.

item.title: I-84 East - Blowing Dust Area
item.description: Blowing Dust Area next 40 miles on I-84 east. This area is roughly between Boardman and Pendleton.

item.title: CA-20 East Traffic Must Stop Ahead
item.description: CA-20 East approaching CA-53 south. This intersection is controlled by a stop sign on CA-20.

item.title: I-19 South - Weapons Illegal In Mexico
item.description: Bilingual warning about prohibition of weapons and ammunition in Mexico on I-19 south. There is another warning further south on I-19.
